name: Brassiere Beach Resort

reviews.text: (Was there Oct 2011- but drop down menu doesn't go back that far)
reviews.title: Very relaxing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Took us 30 mins to drive there from Hua Hin.
reviews.title: Fantastic scenic view

reviews.text: Didn't stay there, just a day trip there to have lunch.
reviews.title: The hidden place for getaway in Pranburi.

reviews.text: Looked around the rooms, they are lovely and all of them are individually decorated.
reviews.title: Beautiful Brassiere

reviews.text: Sitting eating lunch on the lawn, looking out to sea, with an empty beach, and with few guests there was so relaxing.
reviews.title: Superb location, terrible service

aka: Brassiere Beach Resort Thailand/Sam Roi Yod
